div.div: The Receiver always translates any co-ordinates received into a 32768 X 32768 grid irrespective of the input frame of reference. This 32768 X 32768 grid is one of the properties we present to the PC when we enumerate our absolute mouse.

div.div: The PC OS is responsible for scaling this to the appropriate resolution, and in the case of extended desktop this scaling will span the additional monitor spaces.

switch.text: The PC OS is responsible for scaling this to the appropriate resolut...
